tweet: Here are cryptocurrency technologies that I find interesting, technically and/or philosophically: - Bitcoin - Ethereum - Cardano - Dogecoin - Chainlink - Monero - Zcash  If I'm missing something, let me know. I care less about the investment aspect & more about the innovation.

@lexfridman Lex, come check out Secret Network. The first blockchain with privacy preserving smart contracts, combining the privacy of Monero/Zcash with the programmability of Ethereum. Live on mainnet :)  https://t.co/O8uQ3CZCl0
Guys and gals... #Monero is indeed the future of crypto. Do not doubt that for a second. I love you all ❤
